GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object of the article with the provided article id

articles.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
articles.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of the comments with the provided article id

comments.body: The beautiful thing about treasure is that it exists. Got to find out what kind of sheets these are; not cotton, not rayon, silky.
comments.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an object of the new comment posted

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object of the updated article

exampleResponse.title: Another article about Mitch
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge
exampleResponse.body: There will never be enough articles about Mitch!
